sentences.en: A NEW SPECIES OF THE BIRD MALARIAL PALASITE ── PLASMODIUM ( NOVYELLA ) BAMBUSICOLAI ( SPOROZOA: PLASMODIIDAE )
sentences.cn: 鸟疟原虫一新种──竹鸡疟原虫的记述 ( 孢子纲: 疟原虫科 )

sentences.en: All the precautions have been taken against malarial.
sentences.cn: 采取一切措施预防疟疾.

sentences.en: Anti-malarial vaccines are now under-going trials.
sentences.cn: 抗疟疾的疫苗正在试验阶段。

sentences.en: Artemisinin, a new malarial drug, was extracted from a traditional plant.
sentences.cn: 青蒿素, 一种新型的抗疟药物, 是从传统植物中提取的.

sentences.en: But Kelly says the parasite gains the upper hand when anti - malarial drugs are taken sporadically.
sentences.cn: 但是凯莉说,如果 抗 疟疾药物不是按时服用,疟原虫就会产生抗药性.

sentences.en: Instead of feeling ill from drinking this water our hero was cured from the malarial fever!
sentences.cn: 喝这水后我们的英雄不是不舒服,而是从疟疾的发热中被治愈了!

sentences.en: Malarial poison had sallowed his skin.
sentences.cn: 疟疾病毒使他皮肤成灰黄色.

sentences.en: She was suffering from malarial fever, and seemed dying by inches.
sentences.cn: 她当时正发着一种寒热病, 似乎正在慢慢地死去.

sentences.en: Standing water like this gives malarial mosquitoes the perfect place to breed.
sentences.cn: 像这样的死水给了传染疟疾的蚊子绝佳的繁殖地点.

trans.tran_en: You can use malarial to refer to things connected with malaria or areas which are affected by malaria
